name: Board Cyber Briefing Frequency
description: Number of cybersecurity briefings provided to board of directors per year
formula: Count of board presentations with cybersecurity risk content
csf_subcategory_outcome: Outcomes, roles, and responsibilities for cybersecurity risk management are established, communicated, and enforced

name: Policy Compliance Rate
description: Percentage of organizational units meeting cybersecurity policy requirements
csf_subcategory_outcome: Policy for cybersecurity is established based on organizational context, cybersecurity strategy, and priorities and is communicated throughout the organization

name: Cybersecurity Budget Allocation
description: Percentage of IT budget allocated to cybersecurity
csf_subcategory_outcome: The organizational structure and resource allocation for cybersecurity are understood

name: CISO Direct Reporting to Executive Level
description: Executive level of CISO reporting relationship
formula: Boolean check if CISO reports to CEO/COO level

name: Cybersecurity Strategy Document Currency
description: Age of current cybersecurity strategy document

name: Risk Assessment Frequency
description: Number of formal risk assessments conducted per year
csf_subcategory_outcome: Cybersecurity risk management strategy is established, communicated, and enforced throughout the organization

name: Security Training Completion Rate
description: Percentage of employees completing mandatory security training
csf_subcategory_outcome: Personnel are trained to perform their cybersecurity-related duties and responsibilities consistent with organizational policies, standards, and procedures

name: Incident Response Plan Testing
description: Frequency of incident response plan testing and updates
formula: Count of IR plan tests/exercises per year
csf_subcategory_outcome: A response plan that addresses roles, responsibilities, and communication protocols during and after an incident is developed and implemented

name: Third-Party Risk Assessments
description: Percentage of critical vendors with current security assessments
csf_subcategory_outcome: Suppliers are evaluated and selected based on their security posture and ability to meet contractual cybersecurity requirements

name: Cybersecurity Governance Committee Meeting Frequency
description: Number of security governance committee meetings per quarter
formula: Count of governance meetings per quarter
csf_subcategory_outcome: Policy for cybersecurity is established based on organizational context, cybersecurity strategy, and priorities and is communicated throughout the organization

name: Risk Tolerance Statement Currency
description: Months since risk tolerance statement was updated
formula: Months since last risk tolerance update
csf_subcategory_outcome: Cybersecurity risk management strategy is established, communicated, and enforced throughout the organization

name: Cybersecurity Maturity Assessment Score
description: Overall cybersecurity maturity score based on framework assessment
formula: Weighted average of capability maturity scores
csf_subcategory_outcome: Cybersecurity risk management strategy is established, communicated, and enforced throughout the organization

name: Security Investment ROI Measurement
description: Percentage of security investments with defined ROI metrics
formula: Investments with ROI metrics / Total investments * 100

name: Executive Security Training Completion
description: Percentage of executives completing security awareness training

name: Regulatory Compliance Assessment Score
description: Overall compliance score across applicable regulations
formula: Weighted compliance score across all regulations

name: Data Protection Officer Appointment
description: Whether a qualified DPO is appointed and active

name: Cybersecurity Policy Review Cycle
description: Average age of cybersecurity policies since last review

name: Security Architecture Review Board Effectiveness
description: Percentage of architecture decisions reviewed by security board

name: Cybersecurity Insurance Coverage Assessment
description: Percentage of identified cyber risks covered by insurance

name: Security Metrics Dashboard Currency

description: Average days to complete security onboarding for new vendors

name: Business Continuity Governance Integration

name: Security Awareness Campaign Effectiveness

formula: Systems meeting RTO / Total systems tested * 100

name: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) Achievement
description: Percentage of systems meeting RPO during tests
formula: Systems meeting RPO / Total systems tested * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Business Continuity Plan Testing
description: Frequency of business continuity plan testing
formula: Count of BCP tests per year
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Communication System Redundancy
description: Percentage of communication systems with backup capability
formula: Redundant comm systems / Total comm systems * 100

name: Vendor Recovery Coordination
description: Percentage of critical vendors with recovery agreements
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Staff Recovery Training
description: Percentage of critical staff trained on recovery procedures
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Data Recovery Completeness Testing
description: Percentage of critical data successfully recovered during tests
formula: Successfully recovered data / Critical data tested * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Cloud Service Recovery Testing
description: Percentage of cloud services with tested recovery procedures
formula: Cloud services tested / Total critical cloud services * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Alternate Site Readiness
description: Percentage of alternate sites meeting operational readiness requirements
formula: Ready alternate sites / Total alternate sites * 100

name: Supply Chain Recovery Coordination
description: Percentage of critical suppliers with tested recovery coordination
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Process Documentation Currency
description: Percentage of recovery procedures updated within required timeframe
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Business Impact Analysis Accuracy
description: Percentage of BIA predictions that prove accurate during actual events
formula: Accurate BIA predictions / Total validated BIAs * 100

name: Recovery Team Communication Effectiveness
description: Percentage of recovery team members reachable during emergency tests
formula: Reachable team members / Total team members * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Customer Communication During Recovery
description: Percentage of customers notified within required timeframes during recovery
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Resource Availability
description: Percentage of recovery resources available when needed during tests
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Technology Recovery Testing Coverage
description: Percentage of critical technologies with recovery testing
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Plan Activation Time
description: Average time to activate recovery plans after declaration
formula: Sum of activation times / Number of activations
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Lessons Learned Implementation Rate
description: Percentage of recovery lessons learned implemented in updated plans
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Exercise Participation Rate
description: Percentage of required personnel participating in recovery exercises
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Data Center Recovery Capability
description: Percentage of data center services with tested recovery capability
formula: Services with recovery / Total DC services * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Cost Tracking Accuracy
description: Percentage of recovery costs accurately tracked and reported
formula: Accurate cost tracking / Total recovery events * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Third-Party Recovery SLA Compliance
description: Percentage of recovery service providers meeting SLA requirements

name: Recovery Capability Maturity Assessment
description: Overall maturity score of organizational recovery capabilities

csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Business Service Priority Recovery
description: Percentage of high-priority business services meeting recovery objectives
formula: Priority services meeting objectives / Total priority services * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Recovery Communication System Testing
description: Percentage of communication systems tested for recovery scenarios
formula: Tested comm systems / Total comm systems * 100
csf_subcategory_outcome: Recovery objectives and priorities are established based on applicable laws, regulations, or policies, and organizational risk tolerance

name: Regulatory Recovery Reporting Compliance
description: Percentage of recovery events properly reported to regulators
formula: Compliant regulatory reports / Total reportable events * 100

name: Recovery Team Cross-Training Coverage

name: Infrastructure Recovery Automation
